$comment: DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE. This file is generated by ConfigSchemaGen/ConfigSchemaGen.swift.

backgroundPreparationMode.description:
Determines how background indexing should prepare a target. Possible values are:
- `build`: Build a target to prepare it
- `noLazy`: Prepare a target without generating object files but do not do lazy type checking and function body skipping
- `enabled`: Prepare a target without generating object files and the like
backgroundPreparationMode.markdownDescription:
Determines how background indexing should prepare a target. Possible values are:
- `build`: Build a target to prepare it
- `noLazy`: Prepare a target without generating object files but do not do lazy type checking and function body skipping
- `enabled`: Prepare a target without generating object files and the like

buildSettingsTimeout.description: Number of milliseconds to wait for build settings from the build system before using fallback build settings.
buildSettingsTimeout.markdownDescription: Number of milliseconds to wait for build settings from the build system before using fallback build settings.

cancelTextDocumentRequestsOnEditAndClose.description:
Whether sending a `textDocument/didChange` or `textDocument/didClose` notification for a document should cancel
all pending requests for that document.
cancelTextDocumentRequestsOnEditAndClose.markdownDescription:
Whether sending a `textDocument/didChange` or `textDocument/didClose` notification for a document should cancel
all pending requests for that document.

clangdOptions.description: Extra command line arguments passed to `clangd` when launching it
clangdOptions.markdownDescription: Extra command line arguments passed to `clangd` when launching it

compilationDatabase.description: Dictionary with the following keys, defining options for workspaces with a compilation database
compilationDatabase.markdownDescription: Dictionary with the following keys, defining options for workspaces with a compilation database

searchPaths.description: Additional paths to search for a compilation database, relative to a workspace root.
searchPaths.markdownDescription: Additional paths to search for a compilation database, relative to a workspace root.

defaultWorkspaceType.description: Default workspace type (buildserver|compdb|swiftpm). Overrides workspace type selection logic.
defaultWorkspaceType.markdownDescription: Default workspace type (buildserver|compdb|swiftpm). Overrides workspace type selection logic.

fallbackBuildSystem.description: Dictionary with the following keys, defining options for files that aren't managed by any build system
fallbackBuildSystem.markdownDescription: Dictionary with the following keys, defining options for files that aren't managed by any build system

cCompilerFlags.description: Extra arguments passed to the compiler for C files
cCompilerFlags.markdownDescription: Extra arguments passed to the compiler for C files

cxxCompilerFlags.description: Extra arguments passed to the compiler for C++ files
cxxCompilerFlags.markdownDescription: Extra arguments passed to the compiler for C++ files

sdk.description: The SDK to use for fallback arguments. Default is to infer the SDK using `xcrun`.
sdk.markdownDescription: The SDK to use for fallback arguments. Default is to infer the SDK using `xcrun`.

swiftCompilerFlags.description: Extra arguments passed to the compiler for Swift files
swiftCompilerFlags.markdownDescription: Extra arguments passed to the compiler for Swift files

generatedFilesPath.description: Directory in which generated interfaces and macro expansions should be stored.
generatedFilesPath.markdownDescription: Directory in which generated interfaces and macro expansions should be stored.

indexDatabasePath.description: Directory in which the indexstore-db should be stored. By default, inferred from the build system.
indexDatabasePath.markdownDescription: Directory in which the indexstore-db should be stored. By default, inferred from the build system.

indexPrefixMap.description: Path remappings for remapping index data for local use.
indexPrefixMap.markdownDescription: Path remappings for remapping index data for local use.

indexStorePath.description: Directory in which a separate compilation stores the index store. By default, inferred from the build system.
indexStorePath.markdownDescription: Directory in which a separate compilation stores the index store. By default, inferred from the build system.

maxCoresPercentageToUseForBackgroundInde.description: A hint indicating how many cores background indexing should use at most (value between 0 and 1). Background indexing is not required to honor this setting
maxCoresPercentageToUseForBackgroundInde.markdownDescription: A hint indicating how many cores background indexing should use at most (value between 0 and 1). Background indexing is not required to honor this setting

updateIndexStoreTimeout.description: Number of seconds to wait for an update index store task to finish before killing it.
updateIndexStoreTimeout.markdownDescription: Number of seconds to wait for an update index store task to finish before killing it.

logging.description:
Options related to logging, changing SourceKit-LSP’s logging behavior on non-Apple platforms.

On Apple platforms, logging is done through the [system log](Diagnose%20Bundle.md#Enable%20Extended%20Logging).
These options can only be set globally and not per workspace.
logging.markdownDescription:
Options related to logging, changing SourceKit-LSP’s logging behavior on non-Apple platforms.

On Apple platforms, logging is done through the [system log](Diagnose%20Bundle.md#Enable%20Extended%20Logging).
These options can only be set globally and not per workspace.

inputMirrorDirectory.description:
Write all input received by SourceKit-LSP on stdin to a file in this directory.

Useful to record and replay an entire SourceKit-LSP session.
inputMirrorDirectory.markdownDescription:
Write all input received by SourceKit-LSP on stdin to a file in this directory.

Useful to record and replay an entire SourceKit-LSP session.

level.description: The level from which one onwards log messages should be written.
level.markdownDescription: The level from which one onwards log messages should be written.

privacyLevel.description:
Whether potentially sensitive information should be redacted.
Default is `public`, which redacts potentially sensitive information.
privacyLevel.markdownDescription:
Whether potentially sensitive information should be redacted.
Default is `public`, which redacts potentially sensitive information.

sourcekitdRequestTimeout.description:
The maximum duration that a sourcekitd request should be allowed to execute before being declared as timed out.

In general, editors should cancel requests that they are no longer interested in, but in case editors don't cancel
requests, this ensures that a long-running non-cancelled request is not blocking sourcekitd and thus most semantic
functionality.

In particular, VS Code does not cancel the semantic tokens request, which can cause a long-running AST build that
blocks sourcekitd.
sourcekitdRequestTimeout.markdownDescription:
The maximum duration that a sourcekitd request should be allowed to execute before being declared as timed out.

In general, editors should cancel requests that they are no longer interested in, but in case editors don't cancel
requests, this ensures that a long-running non-cancelled request is not blocking sourcekitd and thus most semantic
functionality.

In particular, VS Code does not cancel the semantic tokens request, which can cause a long-running AST build that
blocks sourcekitd.

cCompilerFlags.description: Extra arguments passed to the compiler for C files. Equivalent to SwiftPM's `-Xcc` option.
cCompilerFlags.markdownDescription: Extra arguments passed to the compiler for C files. Equivalent to SwiftPM's `-Xcc` option.

configuration.description:
The configuration to build the project for during background indexing
and the configuration whose build folder should be used for Swift
modules if background indexing is disabled.

Equivalent to SwiftPM's `--configuration` option.
configuration.markdownDescription:
The configuration to build the project for during background indexing
and the configuration whose build folder should be used for Swift
modules if background indexing is disabled.

Equivalent to SwiftPM's `--configuration` option.

cxxCompilerFlags.description: Extra arguments passed to the compiler for C++ files. Equivalent to SwiftPM's `-Xcxx` option.
cxxCompilerFlags.markdownDescription: Extra arguments passed to the compiler for C++ files. Equivalent to SwiftPM's `-Xcxx` option.

disableSandbox.description:
Disables running subprocesses from SwiftPM in a sandbox. Equivalent to SwiftPM's `--disable-sandbox` option
Useful when running `sourcekit-lsp` in a sandbox because nested sandboxes are not supported.
disableSandbox.markdownDescription:
Disables running subprocesses from SwiftPM in a sandbox. Equivalent to SwiftPM's `--disable-sandbox` option
Useful when running `sourcekit-lsp` in a sandbox because nested sandboxes are not supported.

linkerFlags.description: Extra arguments passed to the linker. Equivalent to SwiftPM's `-Xlinker` option.
linkerFlags.markdownDescription: Extra arguments passed to the linker. Equivalent to SwiftPM's `-Xlinker` option.

scratchPath.description:
Build artifacts directory path. If nil, the build system may choose a default value.

This path can be specified as a relative path, which will be interpreted relative to the project root.
Equivalent to SwiftPM's `--scratch-path` option.
scratchPath.markdownDescription:
Build artifacts directory path. If nil, the build system may choose a default value.

This path can be specified as a relative path, which will be interpreted relative to the project root.
Equivalent to SwiftPM's `--scratch-path` option.

swiftCompilerFlags.description: Extra arguments passed to the compiler for Swift files. Equivalent to SwiftPM's `-Xswiftc` option.
swiftCompilerFlags.markdownDescription: Extra arguments passed to the compiler for Swift files. Equivalent to SwiftPM's `-Xswiftc` option.

swiftPublishDiagnosticsDebounceDuration.description:
The time that `SwiftLanguageService` should wait after an edit before starting to compute diagnostics and
sending a `PublishDiagnosticsNotification`.
swiftPublishDiagnosticsDebounceDuration.markdownDescription:
The time that `SwiftLanguageService` should wait after an edit before starting to compute diagnostics and
sending a `PublishDiagnosticsNotification`.

workDoneProgressDebounceDuration.description:
When a task is started that should be displayed to the client as a work done progress, how many milliseconds to
wait before actually starting the work done progress. This prevents flickering of the work done progress in the
client for short-lived index tasks which end within this duration.
workDoneProgressDebounceDuration.markdownDescription:
When a task is started that should be displayed to the client as a work done progress, how many milliseconds to
wait before actually starting the work done progress. This prevents flickering of the work done progress in the
client for short-lived index tasks which end within this duration.

title: SourceKit-LSP Configuration
